sentences.en: Don't think I disbelieve your story.
sentences.cn: 别以为我不相信你的话.

sentences.en: He had never been able to disbelieve it completely.
sentences.cn: 他从未能够对此予以全盘否定。

sentences.en: I see no reason to disbelieve him.
I was forced to disbelieve him.
sentences.cn: 我不得不对他产生怀疑.

sentences.en: I was forced to disbelieve in his story.
I was forced to disbelieve in the existence of God.
sentences.cn: 我不得不怀疑有无上帝.

sentences.en: In another word, disbelieve the viewpoint of other per people.
sentences.cn: 另一种说法, 学会怀疑他人的观点.

sentences.en: Recalled that, we can see that not think disbelieve.
sentences.cn: 回忆起那次所见,阿明觉得不可思议.

sentences.en: The Lazio supporters including me were in a sense of disbelieve.
sentences.cn: 包括我在内的拉齐奥球迷都好像开始都怀疑这一切都是真的.

sentences.en: There was no reason to disbelieve what he had just been told.
sentences.cn: 他不能不相信何慎庵的话.

sentences.en: We disbelieve in the principles of Ingsoc.
Why should I disbelieve her story?
sentences.cn: 我为什么要怀疑她的说法呢？

sentences.en: You have no reason to disbelieve their account of what happened.
sentences.cn: 你不应该不信他们对事情经过的叙述.

trans.tran_en: to not believe something or someone
